title: Fizz is now the only assassin...
body:
...Who is **required** to open the combo with a skill-shot ult. I assume credit goes to Ghostcrawler? 

So I have one shot every 80s which gets cleared by Zhonya. Let's forget the fact that Fizz has no wave clear, no sustain and his only harass QW hits less than Annie Q at lvl1.

replies.body: Why do people insist on linking decisions they dislike to particular Rioters?  This is why so few Rioters are around on these boards.  If you dislike something just express your dislike for it, there's absolutely no need for you to name names.

Ghostcrawler gathered quite some hate back in WoW, and now he is in Riot.

I will do myself a favour and save finding the details as I quited WoW a long time ago when WotLK ended but he seems to have made a lot of bad decisions but anyway.

I assume you do not play WoW. Here's your cookies. GC's work has a pattern:

+random nerf/buff that has zero logic behind.
+Extreme nerf/buff, typically a tweak of 20-50%.
+Generalization that makes everyone looks like their neighbors.

Now you have the clues, go check LoL patch notes since March 2014 and tell me I'm biased.

Fizz changes aren't heavily damage-oriented. He deals about the same AP ratio in damage if everything goes smoothly. 

But the changes hurt a hell lot because Chum the Waters just isn't something reliable to base your entire kit upon as a champion. Coupled with the fact that urchin strike can be dodged if the target is not CC'd and has any form of mobility, Fizz being ahead does not give him an advantage in the game that is comparable to other mid laners. 

So it is indeed more Riot-style nerfs. Doesn't change potential by a lot, but hits upon the reliability and accessibility (a.k.a game and item progression) of damage.

I don't see how any of your post applies to my own post.  Naming someone in the way you did is simply an immature way of putting a face to frustrations you are incapable of dealing with on your own.  I'm not saying you're wrong here, I'm saying you shouldn't be doing what you're doing.
Fizz is also one of the only Assassins to get what is essentially a free Zhonya's on a basic ability that also lets him leap over walls (or just leap in general) along with a dash.
Nice one. Shaco is also the only champ in the world that has flash+invisibility at 6s CD. Sorry, I'm distracted, what's your point again?

The point is that Riot is dumb for keeping Playful/Trickster absolutely the same (CD and base damage and ratio) while simultaneously nerfing the heavens out of all his other abilities, then put half of Fizz's **entire kit damage** into one skillshot that, even if it hits, can be removed by QSS or Zhonya's Hourglass.
SO I HEARD SOME ONE SAY ZE-... Oh, no, we're talking about Fizz and not Zed who's countered by a QSS and Zhonya's?

> [{quoted}](name=DrMarshSwamp,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=VFtYLxUU,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-02-01T07:14:53.074+0000)
>
> Fizz is also one of the only Assassins to get what is essentially a free Zhonya's on a basic ability that also lets him leap over walls (or just leap in general) along with a dash.

definitely not free and here is why

it is now a part of your core damage meaning you will be using it as an engage along with ult
cost a shit ton of mana
it is also your escape, while other assassins cant stand in 1 place they can use other abilities to get in and out which in all honesty is better considering you know where fizz is going when he comes down much like zhonyas

The damage nerfs were bad, the dodgable Q was overkill especially when he has no ranged poke at all

The ability 'can' be used as a Zhonya's, but with the kit change, he has to use it for damage. His other 'dash' is a targeted skill shot. I know, most are going to be like 'Wait, targeted... skill shot?'. It's Lucian's Q pretty much. You target the champion and you have a second to press a dash to the side and you've dodged it or if he's done it from max range, you can also just dash forward to avoid it. You can also dodge his Q by simply knocking him back, up, or otherwise stopping him in place before he hits the target, which is... kind of like a skill shot, except... he's the skill shot? He becomes a projectile and he's stoppable, let's put it that way.

But nooooo

Fizz urchin strike is targeted ability so it has zero counterplay whatsoever!

And now it has counterplay by physically dodging 'him'. lol. I thought it was just a glitch in 5.1, but now that 5.2 says it's a real thing that's here to stay, well... This fish is now too easy to dodge.
Fizz players are starting to realize how op they used to be

I have an idea how to fix Fzz's ult problems without having to re-buff the kit itself. If his shark lands the killing blow, the shark "eats" the champion, and nourishes the shark, allowing it to grow stronger. As a result, the shark increases in size and the AOE from the ult gets bigger, along with the shark doing more damage. And this can stack cho'gath style.

i did the math on fizz at lvl 6, you burn 85% of your mana/resource to have a chance of doing 70% of their life and that is only if you land your skill shot ult that travels slowly. god forbid someone rushes zhonyas. Now the changes would be so bad if he was resourcessless but he is balanced as if he wasn't. Fizz can do okay in games with the right comp however if you literally replaced him with any other mid(maybe not worse then yasuo lol) they would be better and that is the problem.

Nothing really good of note you can really say about fizz atm.

I do agree that we shouldn't point out a specific rioter when we have no idea if they even proposed the fizz change or not. For all we know GC could of been against it.

While i do have a great dislike of Fizz, you bring up a valid point about his ult. I like that he has to use his ult in order to get a kill, since i think an assassin should need his whole kit to kill you...but that when he does it you WILL die without proper response. 
These were the first four that came to mind. 
Zed needs his ult, but it is targeted. 
Talon needs his ult, but it is aoe  and not a skill shot
Ahri "needs" her ult, but all the damage from it is targeted
Akali needs her ult, and it is targeted

The CD being close to that of the hougrlass however isn't really worth mentioning. Since Zed and Talon would have to deal with the same thing, and hourglass is a even better item against them since it gives armor and they are AD. Soooo again, not even worth bringing up. 

I'd be fine with Fizz getting a bit of his Q damage back in exchange for his E getting a longer CD, but i don't see them changing his ult. 

I DO however, find it very strange that they take out the DFG...take the damage amp off of charm...because it is similar to DFG...then do what they did to Fizz ult. Its strange.

So what Fizz has a Zhonya's (Affects on him prior to using E still do whatever they would except for tristana E) as a basic spell? He relies on that spell to do anything so in order to keep him away from Urgot level it needs to be like a zhonya's.
